channel.title: Making My Self Admin in 508
channel.description: I am using Emopks Source for 508! I tried many time to set myself as admin! went to my (charactername).dat and replaced playerrights:0 to 2. when i log in , it resets me and i have to start over again! please help me!!!! my server ip is fathienblade.no-ip.org you can come in there an help or out here! or chat box! Fathienserver.smfforfree3.com please!!!! help!!! me!!!!!!!

item.title: Making My Self Admin in 508
item.dc:creator: @yourusername yourusername
item.description:
@yourusername wrote:

[quote=“project fallout, post:3, topic:303282”]in the initialize method, if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("w/e teh f0rk ur name is"){ p.playerRights = 2; }[/quote]
Yep. But its just easier to search. p.rights = 2

item.title: Making My Self Admin in 508
item.dc:creator: @yourusername yourusername
item.description:
@yourusername wrote:

Search Login and open up the file. Example: Login.java
Anyway. Then Search p.rights = 2; And it should say like a name there or “” Replace the Name with yours
Example: “sonicforce41” just like change the name and you can’t advertise by saying your server ip and/or your forums.

Read full topic
